reviewText: This second season  is  as wonderful  as the first  season!  I just  cannot say  enough  about  how excellent  and so charming this series is!  One of my  favorite episodes in this set is titled "Buttons and Beaux" and the focus in this episode is  on Lizette, who I always liked.The only  thing about  season  2 is, it was a short season  with just  13 episodes and, its really  sad that  they had cancelled the series.This set consists of 4 discs, with the first  3 discs having 4 episodes each  while the 4th  disc has just  one episode.I must  let you know that  the picture  quality  for season  2 is  as super as the first  season  and,  it truly  looks as if they were  made today, its that  good!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I enjoyed this program when it was on the TV. Since it has been several years from the time the program aired it is like watching them for the first time. The DVD's are clear and a pleasure to watch.

reviewText: This is a wholesome family oriented series.  It is is shame it was so shortlived.  Watch it over and over. All age groups will enjoy.

reviewText: Season One was excellent to say the least.  Very few shows keep me glue from episode to episode but it's worth every penny.  Sad that this show didn't take off like the Little House on the Prairie Series.

reviewText: Season two of Father Murphy continues the story of the orphans coping on the frontier. I enjoy these shows as you can watch them with anyone. Highly reccommended if you like family style entertainment. The orphans are cute and play their parts well.
